text: 14.15 Kis 20.11, 2 Sml 12.21, Sng 33.6, 146.6, Apo 10.26, 1 Ko 8.4, 1 Te 1.9, Jem 5.17 Anɨb agɨlek, Bɨ okok, taynen anɨb won ak gebɨm agɨlek? Chɨl God mel, bɨ yɨbɨl yɨpɨd gɨl agɨlek. Pen God bɨawl yɨbɨl tap okok mɨdupsek gɨlak ak, takaw teplep nop ak dad apobul agɨlek. Ne adekab alaŋ gɨlɨl, lum awl gɨlɨl, ñɨg solwala ak gɨlɨl, tap okok mɨdupsek gɨlɨl gak agɨlek. Chɨl takaw teplep nop ak agol, tap yokɨp agnepɨm okok kelɨgɨl, God pel mɨdep ak nop agnɨg yenɨmɨb agɨl nɨbop agobul agɨlek.
